definitions.definition: A geographical region in north-eastern part of modern Croatia .
In medieval times: Banate of Slavonia, covering northern parts of modern Croatia and north-western parts of modern Bosnia.
In early modern times: Kingdom of Slavonia, covering north-eastern parts of modern Croatia and region of Syrmia in modern Serbia.

main_definition: A geographical region in north-eastern part of modern Croatia .
secondary_definitions: In medieval times: Banate of Slavonia, covering northern parts of modern Croatia and north-western parts of modern Bosnia.
In early modern times: Kingdom of Slavonia, covering north-eastern parts of modern Croatia and region of Syrmia in modern Serbia.
